name: SeeMuseums
description: We enhance museum visits with personalized contextual insights powered by AI—making art appreciation accessible to all. At SeeMuseums, we believe every artwork tells a story, and that art should speak to everyone, not just experts.
label: The first agentive art museum tour guide
label_zh: 首个主动式艺术博物馆导游
content_zh: 我们通过人工智能提供个性化的背景信息，让博物馆参观体验更加丰富，使艺术欣赏变得人人可及。在SeeMuseums，我们认为每件艺术品都有其独特的故事，艺术应该面向所有人，而不仅仅是专家。

name: AI Chat
description: AI Chat unites all top AI models in one app - but the real magic is Husky AI: our own AI Search Engine that combines Web + Telegram for real-time, local, uncensored answers. Save $800+/year by using one tool instead of paying for each model separately.
label: Husky, ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, Grok & more - all in one app
label_zh: 哈士奇、ChatGPT、Gemini、Claude、Grok等——全部整合在一个应用中
content_zh: AI Chat 将所有顶级 AI 模型整合到一个应用中，但真正的亮点是 Husky AI：我们自主研发的 AI 搜索引擎，结合了网络和 Telegram，提供实时、本地且无审查的答案。使用这一工具可以节省每年 800 美元以上的费用，无需为每个模型单独付费。

name: Rubber Duck Armada
description: A fun clicker-game that's all about rubber ducks.
label: A fun clicker-game that's all about rubber ducks
label_zh: 一款关于橡皮鸭的趣味点击游戏
content_zh: 一款有趣的点击游戏，主角是一群橡皮鸭。

name: Aladin
description: Aladin brings AI to every site, doc, and video—right where you work. With built-in tools, context-aware buttons in every tab, and support for your favorite apps, it’s always ready to help, right when you need it.
label: Supercharge your browser with AI
content_zh: Aladin 可以将 AI 带到你工作的每一个网站、文档和视频中。它内置了各种工具，在每个标签页中都有上下文感知的按钮，并支持你常用的应用程序，随时准备在你需要的时候提供帮助。

name: Photo AI 4
description: Make good photos great. Sharpen, denoise, and upscale your images with tomorrow’s technology.
label: Studio-level focus, detail, and clarity anywhere you shoot
label_zh: 影棚级的焦点、细节和清晰度，无论您在哪里拍摄
content_zh: 让好照片变得更好。使用最新的技术锐化、降噪和放大你的图片。

name: Aurascope
description: Aurascope is a camera-first mobile app that lets you scan real-world objects, places, and people to see how they affect your energy. Track your daily score, grow your collection, and compete with friends to stay in sync with your surroundings.
label: Scan the world, collect aura points, compete with friends
label_zh: 扫描世界，收集光环点数，与朋友竞争
content_zh: Aurascope 是一款以摄像头为主的手机应用，可以扫描现实中的物体、地点和人物，看看它们如何影响你的能量。你可以跟踪每日得分，增加收藏，并与朋友竞争，保持与周围环境的同步。

name: AI Voice Cloning
description: Sick of AI "robot voices"? Our model clones voices with SOUL in 3 secs! Tone & pitch so real, it'll wow you—easily outshining others! Core FREE. Experience true voice magic!
label: Clone any voice in 3 seconds – hyper-realistic and free
label_zh: 3秒克隆任何声音 – 超逼真且免费
content_zh: 厌倦了AI的“机器人声音”？我们的模型只需3秒就能克隆出有灵魂的声音！音调和音高如此逼真，绝对让你惊叹，轻松超越其他产品！核心功能免费。体验真正的声音魔法！

name: Hautedrop
description:
Your fashion alerts, delivered! 

Get notifications of new product releases from your favorite luxury brand.

Select your category, demographic, brand preferences and signup through email and / or your mobile number to receive new product launch notifications.
label: Your fashion alerts, delivered!
content_zh:
您的时尚提醒，准时送达！

获取您喜爱的奢侈品牌新品发布的通知。

选择您的类别、目标群体和品牌偏好，通过电子邮件或手机号码注册，接收新品上市的通知。

name: QU3
description: QU3 is a quantum-secure Web3 layer that merges post-quantum cryptography, AI orchestration, and inter-chain routing. Its core MCP server enables encrypted, verifiable AI compute, turning sensitive workloads into tamper-proof, cross-chain transactions.
label: Quantum-safe MCP servers for private, verifiable inference
label_zh: 量子安全的MCP服务器，用于私密、可验证的推理
content_zh: QU3 是一个量子安全的 Web3 层，结合了后量子加密技术、AI 协调和跨链路由。其核心的 MCP 服务器支持加密且可验证的 AI 计算，将敏感的工作负载转化为防篡改的跨链交易。

name: Voila
description: oila is an open-source voice-language model family by Maitrix.org & labs for low-latency, emotionally rich AI voice role-play, ASR & TTS.
label: Open-source AI for real-time, expressive voice role-play
label_zh: 开源AI，用于实时、富有表现力的声音角色扮演
content_zh: Voila 是由 Maitrix.org 和实验室开发的开源语音-语言模型系列，旨在实现低延迟、情感丰富的 AI 语音角色扮演、语音识别和文本转语音功能。

name: Autograph Fair Offer
description: Fair Offer uses an algorithm (not just stale survey data) to help you figure out what a reasonable compensation range is... for any title, at any stage of company, anywhere in the world. Built by Autograph, the OS for managing your headcount.
label: Estimate fair compensation for any role
label_zh: 估算任何职位的合理薪酬
content_zh: Autograph Fair Offer 使用一种算法（不仅仅是过时的调查数据）来帮助你确定合理的薪酬范围……无论职位、公司发展阶段，还是全球任何地方。该工具由 Autograph 开发，是一款用于管理员工人数的操作系统。

name: duration.ai
description:
Duration is an AI platform that helps you build, sell, and personalise learning plans effortlessly.

We made a platform focused on real student outcomes, built around what actually works: personalisation, feedback, and accountability.
label: AI platform to build and personalize online education plans
label_zh: AI平台，用于构建和个性化在线教育计划
content_zh:
Duration.ai 是一个 AI 平台，帮助你轻松构建、销售和个性化学习计划。

我们打造了一个专注于实际学生效果的平台，围绕真正有效的方法：个性化、反馈和责任机制。

name: VProPle Interview Bites
description: VProPle Interview Bites is a video pre-screening tool that helps hiring teams go beyond the resume. It identifies real knowledge, detects malpractice, filters out uninterested candidates, and ensures a more accurate, and cost-effective hiring process.
label: Cut costs, not quality, with performance based pre-screening
label_zh: 降低成本，不减质量，基于性能的预先筛选
content_zh: VProPle Interview Bites 是一款视频预筛选工具，帮助招聘团队超越简历的局限。它能识别应聘者的真实知识水平，检测不当行为，筛选掉不感兴趣的候选人，从而确保招聘过程更加准确和经济高效。

name: RabbitGUI
description: Debug, monitor, and manage RabbitMQ with a modern developer interface. RabbitGUI supports multiple connexions, quick search, debug mode, and much more.
label: The missing rabbitmq IDE
content_zh: 使用RabbitGUI，你可以通过现代化的开发者界面来调试、监控和管理RabbitMQ。RabbitGUI支持多连接、快速搜索、调试模式等功能。

name: Law Online | Law AI
description: Law Online is the AI side-kick built for busy legal professionals. Draft contracts and pleadings, analyse complex documents, transcribe court audio. Plans start at $9.99/mo and Product Hunt users get 20 % off any plan with code PRODUCTHUNT.
label: Transcribe, draft, analyse & translate legal docs in minutes
label_zh: 几分钟内转录、起草、分析和翻译法律文件
content_zh: Law Online 是专为忙碌的法律专业人士设计的 AI 助手。它可以帮你起草合同和诉状，分析复杂文件，转录法庭音频。套餐起价每月 9.99 美元，Product Hunt 用户使用代码 PRODUCTHUNT 可享受任何套餐 20% 的折扣。
